title: See the official UFC 245 poster that features all three title fights
text:
The UFC’s final pay-per-view of 2019 will feature three big title fights, and now the event has an official poster.

The much anticipated grudge match between welterweight champion Kamaru Usman and former interim champ Colby Covington finally will be settled Dec. 14. Both fighters have had a very similar path to the top, but only one will cap off 2019 as undisputed champ.

Max Holloway might have failed to capture the interim 155-pound title, but he’s still marching steadily at featherweight. It’s been over six years since Holloway lost at 145 pounds, as he looks to defend his title against a tough and durable Alexander Volkanovski, who will look to add more gold to City Kickboxing.

Finally, the consensus greatest female fighter of all time and current double champ, Amanda Nunes, will return to action when she puts her bantamweight strap on the line against seasoned striker and former featherweight champ Germaine de Randamie.

Check out the official poster (via Twitter) for UFC 245, which takes place Dec. 14 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas:

All roads lead to Las Vegas! Your official #UFC245 poster has just landed! pic.twitter.com/hkEvZWPZ0U — UFC (@ufc) October 26, 2019

The latest UFC 245 lineup includes:

Kamaru Usman vs. Colby Covington – for welterweight title

Max Holloway vs. Alexander Volkanovski – for featherweight title

Amanda Nunes vs. Germaine de Randamie – for women’s bantamweight title

Jose Aldo vs. Marlon Moraes

Urijah Faber vs. Petr Yan

Matt Brown vs. Ben Saunders

Jessica Eye vs. Viviane Araujo

Kai Kara-France vs. Brandon Moreno

Oskar Piechota vs. Punahele Soriano

The Blue Corner is MMA Junkie’s blog space. We don’t take it overly serious, and neither should you. If you come complaining to us that something you read here is not hard-hitting news, expect to have the previous sentence repeated in ALL CAPS.
description: The UFC's final pay-per-view of 2019 will feature three big title fights, and now the event has an official poster.
